com.se.simplicity.vector
Class SimpleTranslationVectorf4

java.lang.Object
  com.se.simplicity.vector.ArrayBackedObjectf
      com.se.simplicity.vector.SimpleVectorf4
          com.se.simplicity.vector.SimpleTranslationVectorf4
All Implemented Interfaces:
TranslationVectorf, Vectorf, java.io.Serializable
public class SimpleTranslationVectorf4
extends SimpleVectorf4
implements TranslationVectorf

A 4 dimensional translation vector that stores its data in a float array.

This SimpleVectorf4 uses a 3D homogeneous coordinate system. It is of the following format: 

 ----------------
  x | y | z | w |
 ----------------

Author:
Gary Buyn
See Also:
Serialized Form
